English.Text: The diplomat is rude, the old lady refuses to help them. They wait for the person in charge for two hours and when he arrives, the old lady whispers a few words to him while looking at the sailors. The administrative officers lets everybody else go first and when it's finally the crew turn the officers shot "End of office hours, please leave the building!" The crew has last hours for nothing, go back to the ship which is forced to leave the harbour.
